indlearners_body_text:
Since July 2020, Robotics for All has provided online courses for students from K- 8th grade.

* Classes run for 8 weeks. All classes are taught in English.
* Classes include one or two live sessions over Zoom and optional homework
* Each class will have a maximum student-instructor ratio of roughly 5:1
* Lead instructors and Teachers Assistants are high school students and above
* All volunteers over the age of 18 must pass a detailed background check run
* **Every** volunteer is carefully screened through a comprehensive written application and interview before being accepted.
schools_bold_text: Talk to us about our programs!
schools_body_text:
Since July 2020, Robotics for All has provided online courses for students from K- 8th grade. We are now offering our classes to schools and partner organizations. Partner organizations may teach our curriculum and receive training from our curriculum team or have Robotics for All teachers teach the classes. All of our curriculum for partnered organizations can be taught in-person. Please contact us for more detail on training, logistics, and acquiring kits.

Partners may select one of our suggested courses under "Course Offerings" (below) or may run any course that is on our full syllibus (bottom of page).

Our curriculum generally includes 16 one-hour classes that are typically taught twice a week for 8 weeks. You may teach the classes as frequently as needed. Start and end dates are flexible.
